Hero.title: Professional Dentistry for the Whole Family
Hero.desc: Modern treatment methods, highly qualified doctors, and a comfortable atmosphere in the heart of the city. We care about your smile.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Professional dentistry: innovative technologies and a personalized approach for the health and beauty of your smile.
Services.therapy_desc: Gentle treatment of caries, pulpitis, and gum diseases using a microscope.
Services.orthodontics_desc: Bite correction of any complexity using aligners and modern bracket systems.
Services.implant_desc: Tooth restoration in one day. Premium implants with a lifetime warranty.
Services.esthetics_desc: Creating a perfect 'Hollywood' smile: veneers, whitening, and restoration.

treatment.title: Dental Treatment
treatment.desc: Modern methods for treating caries, pulpitis, and periodontitis. We use high-precision microscopes for perfect results.

implantation.title: Implantation
implantation.desc: Tooth restoration with world-class implants. Painless installation and a lifetime warranty on materials.

whitening.title: Whitening
whitening.desc: Gentle in-office ZOOM 4 whitening. Lightening by 8-10 shades without harming enamel or sensitivity.

braces.title: Braces
braces.desc: Bite correction of any complexity. Metal, ceramic, and sapphire systems for a perfect smile.

prosthetics.title: Prosthetics
prosthetics.desc: Aesthetic veneers, zirconium, and ceramic crowns. Digital modeling of your future smile.

kids.title: Pediatric Dentistry
kids.desc: Painless and fear-free treatment in a playful form. We build healthy dental habits from childhood.

Specialists.title: Our Specialists
Specialists.subtitle: A team of professionals with over 15 years of experience

dr_ivanov.name: Dr. Alexander Ivanov
dr_ivanov.desc: 18 years of experience. Interned in Germany and Switzerland.

dr_smirnova.name: Dr. Elena Smirnova
dr_smirnova.desc: Specialist in correcting bites of any complexity.

texts.r1: I was very afraid of dentists since childhood, but here all fears passed. Painless, fast, and very high quality. Many thanks to Dr. Ivanov!
texts.r2: Had veneers done by Elena Smirnova. The result exceeded expectations! Now I can't stop smiling. The clinic is very cozy and stylish.
texts.r3: Brought my child for the first check-up. The doctor found a way immediately; my son didn't even cry. Now we will only come here.
texts.r4: Professional approach to every patient. Very satisfied with the whitening result.
texts.r5: Implantation was much easier than I expected. High level of medicine!
texts.r6: Polite staff and modern equipment. Caries treatment under a microscope is great.
texts.r7: The clinic is clean and beautiful, and the doctors are true masters of their craft.
texts.r8: We looked for a pediatric dentist for a long time and finally found one. The child goes to the clinic with pleasure.
texts.r9: The best dentistry in the city. Highly recommend to everyone!
texts.r10: Correcting bites as a whole family. Results are visible within a couple of months.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Leave a request, and our administrator will contact you within 15 minutes to arrange a convenient appointment time.

Footer.description: Creating healthy and beautiful smiles since 2010. We use only certified materials and equipment.
Footer.copy: StomaCare Dental Clinic. All rights reserved.

Gallery.title: Our Gallery
Gallery.subtitle: Take a look at our clinic, modern equipment, and the comfortable environment we provide for your treatment.

alt.interior: Interior of the modern Wish dental clinic
alt.reception: Clinic reception and comfortable waiting area
alt.treatment: Dental treatment process using a high-precision microscope
